tosdr.tldr: Turnitin can suspend your account to prevent damages to their services, comply with laws/regulations/government requests, protect Turnitin from legal liability, or if you breach the user agreement.
tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
quoteText:
Turnitin may, in its sole discretion, suspend or terminate Your access to the Site to (i) prevent damages to, or degradation of, the Services.
(ii) comply with any law, regulation, court order, or other governmental request.
(iii) otherwise protect Turnitin from potential legal liability.
or (iv) in response to Your breach of this User Agreement.
